body: @mageddo Our applications is about 2 million lines of code and the application itself was moved successfully  from MySQL to Postgresql. You have to be careful about your use of standard SQL but you can do it (as we did). In any case, there are a lot of applications which need meta data and it's just short-sighted, in my opinion, not to include that as part of the sql package. And there is no reason it couldn't be included as in the same way it is done with JDBC.
